description: Emerald came up from LA to work with us. She'd never seen anything like the machines and we'd never seen anyone who asked for them to be turned up so high. The Intruder was working so hard that I had to stand on it to prevent it from moving too much. The Invader and Violator were also turned up almost to their highest setting. In fact, the only machine she didn't take at full speed was the Fucksall. Considering it is a power tool designed for cutting, we thought that was fair enough. We've included video footage of Emerald describing what it's like to be fucked by the Intruder. Suffice to say, she enjoyed it!
title: Emerald
